title: KKR Makes AI Play With Nearly $11 Billion Asia Data-Center Deal
title_zh: KKR 通过近 110 亿美元的亚洲数据中心交易让人工智能发挥作用
summary: A  KKR  -led consortium has agreed to acquire a Singapore data-center company valued at $10.9 billion, marking the U.S. firm’s largest Asia-Pacific infrastructure investment yet as the AI frenzy fuels demand for tech assets.
summary_zh: KKR 领导的财团已同意以 109 亿美元的价格收购一家新加坡数据中心公司，这是该美国公司迄今为止最大的亚太基础设施投资，因为人工智能热潮刺激了对科技资产的需求。

title: Nvidia nears deal to invest $20 billion in OpenAI funding round, source says
title_zh: 消息人士称，英伟达即将在 OpenAI 融资轮中投资 200 亿美元
summary: Nvidia is nearing a deal to invest roughly $20 billion in OpenAI as part of its latest funding round, ​a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.
summary_zh: 一位知情人士周二告诉路透社，作为最新一轮融资的一部分，Nvidia 即将达成协议，向 OpenAI 投资约 200 亿美元。

title: Silicon Labs Stock Pops on Report of Deal Talks With Texas Instruments
title_zh: Silicon Labs 股价因与德州仪器 (TI) 的交易谈判报告而上涨
summary: Texas Instruments  is in advanced discussions about buying Silicon Laboratories, a maker of mixed-signal chips used in smart homes, industrial automation, and commercial applications, according to a report.
summary_zh: 据报道，德州仪器 (TI) 正在就收购 Silicon Laboratories 进行深入讨论，该公司是一家智能家居、工业自动化和商业应用混合信号芯片制造商。

title: Looking At The Apple AAPL Narrative After Gemini Deal And Margin Concerns
title_zh: 看看 Gemini 交易后苹果 AAPL 的叙述和利润率担忧
summary: The latest update on Apple’s stock story includes a small lift in fair value, from US$286.58 to US$291.65 per share, alongside a slightly higher discount rate at 8.31% and more conservative long run revenue growth assumptions at 6.99%.
summary_zh: 苹果股价的最新更新包括公允价值小幅上涨，从每股 286.58 美元升至 291.65 美元，贴现率略高至 8.31%，以及更保守的长期收入增长假设为 6.99%。

title: Energy Transfer (ET) Expands Pipeline Power with New Deals
title_zh: 能源传输 (ET) 通过新交易扩大管道电力
summary: Energy Transfer LP (NYSE:ET) is one of the best cheap stocks to buy for 2026. On January 21, Goldman Sachs increased its price target for Energy Transfer LP (NYSE:ET) to $19.00 from $18.50 and kept a Neutral rating on the stock.
summary_zh: Energy Transfer LP (NYSE:ET) 是 2026 年最值得买入的廉价股票之一。1 月 21 日，高盛将 Energy Transfer LP (NYSE:ET) 的目标股价从 18.50 美元上调至 19.00 美元，并维持该股的中性评级。
